pkgmetadata.longdescription: multiformats-config: Configuration for the 'multiformats' package.==================================================================.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.7+-green.svg :target: https://docs.python.org/3.7/ :alt: Python versions.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/multiformats-config.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/multiformats-config/ :alt: PyPI version.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/status/multiformats-config.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/multiformats-config/ :alt: PyPI status.. image:: http://www.mypy-lang.org/static/mypy_badge.svg :target: https://github.com/python/mypy :alt: Checked with MypyThis module provides configuration and table information for the `multiformats <https://github.com/hashberg-io/multiformats/>`_ library.License-------`MIT Â© Hashberg Ltd. <LICENSE>`_See `additional Licenses <ADDITIONAL-LICENSES>`_ for licensing of the multicodec table, the multibase table and test vectors for multihashes.
